reviews.title: Learner\'s Tool
reviews.comment: Very excellent for someone like myself trying to learn basic Russian, and in this case reading. You can tap a small button anytime to have the reader repeat the page. Worth springing for the ad-free version. Very wonderful!
reviews.author: A Google User
